name: Aether CSm
flavor: How will we know when we've found all of the secrets?

name: Against All Odds
flavor: Threat assessment calculates your odds of survival at 3,721:1...unless you pull this trigger.

name: Arighan's Blossom
flavor: Built in tribute to a legend.

name: Arma Engine DOA
flavor: Heavy firepower modified to fit the exacting specifications of Dead Orbit's expanding arsenal.

name: Backscratcher 9.0
flavor: Feels so good. For you, not them.

name: Bane of the Taken
flavor: The king is dead.

name: Baron's Ambition
flavor: "To crack open that depraved Earth-Servitor. To use its secrets to reclaim the Great Machine..." —Translated from Fallen Language

name: BFF 2.0
flavor: Sometimes, no matter how much it hurts, you just can't pass up a chance to upgrade.

name: Bretomart's Stand
flavor: A heavy-fire weapon, forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Bronzed Thutmose-D
flavor: A powerful Häkke firearm, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: BTRD-345
flavor: A multirole Vanguard machine gun. The serial number memorializes the number of kills the prototype scored in field test.

name: BTRD-345
flavor: Better than the rest.

name: Chain of Orbiks-Fel
flavor: The destruction of the Wolfship Orbiks-Fel during the Reef Wars is commemorated with every round fired.

name: Corrective Measure
flavor: It breaks the rules of reality as ruthlessly as it shatters your foes.

name: Cyrus-B
flavor: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Cyrus Bravo slams targets with massive slugs, putting damage above all else.

name: Darius-B
flavor: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Darius Bravo slams targets with massive slugs, putting damage above all else.

name: Darius-C
flavor: This high-powered machine gun delivers inertia-coupled ram rounds, inflicting extraordinary damage.

name: Deviant Gravity-A
flavor: A machine gun modified by Dead Orbit's superb technicians and specialists.

name: Diluvian 10/4x
flavor: Tossed upon the seas of war and tragedy.

name: Formerly Penitent
flavor: Belt-fed absolution.

name: Genghis-E
flavor: The heavy Genghis Delta machine gun uses sapphire wiring to integrate tactical systems.

name: Genghis-E1
flavor: Echo-1 Genghis variant, built to put rounds through Cabal armor and anything inside.

name: Hannibal-E
flavor: This Echo variant is rigged for destruction through the delivery of sustained heavy fire.

name: Harrowed Qullim's Terminus
flavor: "If only...if only we had heeded the Queen..."

name: Horologium
flavor: A Guardian relic named for the clock of the night sky.

name: Jolder's Hammer
flavor: A machine gun forged in fire by the Lords of the Iron Banner.

name: Karst-MG4
flavor: Yawning caves. Clinging damp. Hidden alcoves. Stay sharp.

name: Lacustrine-MG4
flavor: Taste of water. Scrape of dirt. Swath of grass. Take aim.

name: Lunation CSc
flavor: How shall we measure the passage of time?

name: Maria-MG3
flavor: The nothingness dispenser.

name: MG18A Harm's Way
flavor: Dark plains. Starry skies. Clear air. Reclaim the range.

name: Nihilist CSc
flavor: How do you make meaning from battle with chaos incarnate?

name: Objection IV
flavor: Executor-issued machine gun for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Pacifier X
flavor: Executor-issued heavy-fire weapon, custom-rigged for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Painted Artemisia-D
flavor: A highly accurate Häkke heavy machine gun, earned through glory in the Crucible.

name: Phenomena CSm
flavor: To the wondering eye, what is not a miracle?

name: Planetary CSc
flavor: What planet will not, one day soon, sing of your deeds?

name: Prestige IV
flavor: Executor-issued machine gun for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Qua Brecan I
flavor: The science of savagery lies in the smallest of weaknesses.

name: Qua Roris I
flavor: Some minds are a palace. Others, a prison. A Warlock's is both.

name: Qullim's Terminus
flavor: "If only...if only we had heeded the Queen..."

name: Red River Mk. 40
flavor: It'll live up to its name, just as long as the target actually bleeds something red.

name: Rift Valley-MG3
flavor: Wound in the earth. Long vectors. Clean shots. Our dream, and yours.

name: Ruin Wake
flavor: Before you, only victory. Behind you, only conquest.

name: Sargon-A
flavor: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Sargon-A Team Support Weapon is an all-purpose death machine.

name: Sargon-B
flavor: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Sargon B-series delivers an improved fluorocarbon cooling system.

name: Sargon-B1
flavor: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Sargon-B1 Team Support Weapon is an answer to Fallen shock tactics.

name: Sargon-B2
flavor: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Sargon-B2 is a general-purpose weapon noted for its pleasant ergonomics.

name: Sargon-C
flavor: Sargon Charlie is a precision support weapon. A smart-gel barrel bath sinks heat and keeps shot grouping tight.

name: Sawtooth Oscillator
flavor: Additive synthesis, where A is amplitude and B is bullets in their face.

name: Song of Ir Yût
flavor: It is the song of endings.

name: Spirit of Alliance
flavor: Named by a very optimistic Earthborn Awoken, or his equally oblivious Reefborn counterpart.

name: SudaZomba-3
flavor: Sing along. The rhythm's not hard to catch.

name: Super Good Advice
flavor: This weapon is full of it.

name: Tamerlane-B
flavor: Fully automatic heavy machine gun. The Tamerlane Bravo is a long-range support weapon with excellent precision for its class.

name: Tamerlane-C3
flavor: The Tamerlane-C3 team support gun boasts a mag-suspended precision barrel and onboard electronics.

name: Tamerlane-E1
flavor: The heavy Echo-1 Tamerlane uses sapphire wiring to integrate tactical systems.

name: The Culling
flavor: A machine gun named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: The Infinite Theorem
flavor: In the mirrorlike crags of the Fields of Glass, a single mote of dust produces infinite reflections.

name: THE SWARM
flavor: Hunger is the all of it, and it is all of hunger.

name: The Unseeing Eye
flavor: "It is the blind eye that knows most keenly what it does not see." —Parables of the Allspring

name: The Variable
flavor: A heavy-fire weapon, named and sanctified by the leaders of the Future War Cult.

name: Thunderlord
flavor: "They rest quiet on fields afar…for this is no ending, but the eye."

name: Unending Deluge III
flavor: When it rains…

name: Wolves' Bane
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Wolves' Bane
flavor: During the Hildian Campaign, the Queen had need of weapons that could fire in a vacuum as well as an atmosphere.

name: Wolves' Curse
flavor: An Awoken gift from the Reef, marked with the Queen's crown.

name: Xerxes-C
flavor: Conquer new worlds with the decisive thunderclap of the Xerxes' heavy rounds.

name: Xerxes-E
flavor: Beneath the loud color scheme is an intricate mechanism utterly devoted to the delivery of brute force.

name: Xerxes-E1
flavor: Echo-1 variant of the popular Xerxes. The weapon's corkscrew heart pumps coolant blood.

name: Zombie Apocalypse WF47
flavor: Ready for one breed of armageddon.

name: Nemesis Star
flavor: What is the answer when the question is extinction?

name: IF MATERIA~
flavor: Diluvian 10/4x: Tossed upon the seas of war and ~SIVA

name: The Silvered Dread
flavor: Forged in honor of Felwinter, he who tried to avert the doom on the horizon.

name: Unending Deluge III
flavor: When it rains…

name: Bonekruscher
flavor: Your bones… I will crush them.

name: Chaotic Neutral
flavor: Beholden to no one.

name: First Citizen IX
flavor: Executor-issued machine gun for loyal supporters of the New Monarchy.

name: Nova Mortis
flavor: "From the space between I come. Fragments of stars burn in my footsteps. In my hands I hold Death." —Song of the Nova Mortis

name: Abbadon
flavor: "I am one with the flame. The conflagration reborn. I am your funeral pyre." —Anthem of the Abbadon
